    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          <title>
            <string language="fr">Le cycle de vie d'un plant de petit pois</string>
            <string language="en">The life cycle of a pea plant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Lebenszyklus eines Erbse Betriebes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O ciclo de vida de uma planta da ervilha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il ciclo di vita di una pianta dei piselli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο κύκλος ζωής εγκαταστάσεων μπιζελιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El ciclo vital de una planta del guisante</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Troisième dans une série de six illustrations montrant les étapes de la vie d'un plant de petit pois. Montrées ici sont des graines de pois sortant  de la cosse sèche ouverte.</string>
            <string language="en">Third in a series of six illustrations showing the life stages of a plea plant.  Shown here are pea seeds dropping out of the opened dry pod.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">séchant</string>
            <string language="en">drying</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">fruits</string>
            <string language="en">fruits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">cycle de vie</string>
            <string language="en">life cycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pois</string>
            <string language="en">pea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plants</string>
            <string language="en">Plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">cosses</string>
            <string language="en">pods</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">graines</string>
            <string language="en">seeds</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Third in einer Reihe von sechs Abbildungen, welche
die Lebenstadien eines Vorwandbetriebes zeigen. Hier gezeigt die
Erbsensamen, die aus der geöffneten trockenen Hülse heraus fallen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Third em uma série de seis ilustrações que 
mostram os estágios da vida de uma planta do plea. São 
mostradas aqui as sementes de ervilha que deixam cair fora do pod seco
aberto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terzo in serie di sei illustrazioni che mostrano 
le fasi di vita di una pianta di richiesta. Sono indicati qui i 
semi di pisello che cadono dal baccello asciutto aperto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίτο σε μία σειρά έξι απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν 
στάδια ζωής εγκαταστάσεων αίτησης. Εμφανισμένοι εδώ είναι
οι σπόροι μπιζελιών μειωμένος έξω του ανοιγμένου ξηρού λοβού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tercero en una serie de seis ilustraciones que 
muestran las etapas de la vida de una planta de la súplica. Se 
muestran aquí los gérmenes de guisante que caen de la vaina seca 
abierta.</string>
          </description>
